item.title: Large plastic storage box in communal garden left up against a fence. Other litter including empty cans left on grass., 29th July
item.description:
This storage box has been in the communal garden adjacent to the flats in Strongbow Road for months. There is also other debris including cans littered on the grass. I have previously requested that the box be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Strongbow Crescent, Well Hall, London

item.title: Constant dumped rubbish by flytippers, 29th July
item.description:

item.title: Collapsed service channel across the width of the road, 29th July
item.description:

item.title: Staircase smelling of urine. Please review your inspection, 29th July
item.description:
You have just closed a previous reporting due to an inspection that has not find anything. Please see attached fotos of pavement dirty with urine that is leading to an unbearable stink all over the communal staircase. The are has not been mopped for months despite previous reports. Please review the procedure you follow for inspection as previous cases were closed because the inspection had not found anything.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Sedgmoor Place, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 29th July
item.description:
This road had several areas with graffiti on lamp posts recently, The crew have been out very promptly to clean all the areas but there are a couple of places that they must of missed, one is on the lamp post by keston Court and another further down near the bus stop .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Parkhill Road, Bexley, London
